A Portable Desk for Working/Eating in Cars

The Pi Foldable Lap Desk

I don't envy those who have to work, or live, out of their cars, but that's the reality for some. Chinese manufacturer FansDreams aims to make those tasks a bit easier with their Pi Foldable Lap Desk.

It's made out of fiberglass wrapped in waterproof faux leather. It folds down to ½" thick, weighs two pounds and can support 44 pounds.

Two sizes are offered, with the Pi going for $100 and the Pi Max going for $130.
